據.definition: according to; to act in accordance with; to depend on; to seize; to occupy

據信.definition: according to belief; it is believed that

據傳.definition: it is rumored that ...; it is reported that ...

據報.definition: it is reported; according to reports

據報道.definition: according to a report; It is reported that...

據守.definition: to guard; to hold a fortified position; entrenched

據實以告.definition: to report according to the facts; to tell the truth; to tell it like it is

據悉.definition: according to reports; it is reported (that)

據情辦理.definition: to handle a situation according to the circumstances (idiom)

據我所知.definition: as far as I know; to the best of my knowledge

據我看.definition: in my view; in my opinion; from what I can see

據料.definition: according to forecasts; it is expected that...

據有.definition: to occupy; to hold; to possess

據此.definition: accordingly; in view of the above

據為己有.definition: (idiom) to illegally take possession of; to appropriate

據理力爭.definition: to contend on strong grounds; to argue strongly for what is right

據稱.definition: it is said; allegedly; according to reports; or so they say

據聞.definition: it is said; it is alleged; it is reported

據險.definition: to rely on natural barriers (for one's defense)

據點.definition: stronghold; defended military base; base for operations; strategic point; foothold; (market) presence
